name: SoulFrost
description: This is a short but hard minimalistic scroll shooter where you race against doing too many actions to keep more energy, without which you won't make it to the end. Lightweight narrative art-game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 500MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 64MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 50 MB available space
